name: MINI-GAUNTLET
description:
People say that ghosts attack once, and vanish taking some of your power as they go. But, one ghost who was left behind by Merlin, realized he would not survive alone in empty rooms and set off in search of his fellows. Mini-Gauntlet is a minimalist and twisted remake of the Gauntlet for NES and its plot is about -- besides nostalgia -- survival and hope.

Design and music by Anselmo A. Peretto.
